ygData.subject: List Moderator Here
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings everyone, this is the list moderator, I m pleased to see everyone who joined, and overwhelmed at the number of people.  I did not expect so many
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings everyone, this is the list moderator, I'm pleased to see everyone
who joined, and overwhelmed at the number of people. I did not expect so
many people to join. However the number of the people on this list is not
working well with the number of messages (0). So I'm going to start off
hopefully. I'd like to hear from all of you the most rewarding Static Quest
you have been on. If you don't know what that is, it's a quest that is
available 24/7. Not a GM or Guild Created quest, those are Dynamic Quests.
But back onto the subject, the most rewarding static quest I've been on is in
Qeynos (The best city :P), which is the quest of collecting taxes for Vicus,
who is the tax collector but hes got a bit of a cough and he can't do his
job.
He normally gives a number of silver pieces, experience, and up to 2 items,
at least thats the best I've had. The biggest silver: 24. The biggest exp:
3/4 of a Bubble. Best items: A gem and an earring.

Please reply to the list w/ what you think was the most rewarding quest
you've been on. Also if anyone has any tips/hints/tricks on anything that is
helpful in the game, send 'em in. And if anyone has questions about something
in the game thats not general (i.e. no newbie crap, im not here to babysit,
play the tutorial), don't hesitate to send in.
